posts.post_content:
Putting together a team set.  Need most.

Must have decent photo quality.

Prefer SGC 50 - SGC 84 but will consider PSA 4 - PSA 7 and raw VG-EX - NM.

Willing to pay a reasonable premium above current market.

Lots to trade.

Will respond promptly to emails and PMs.

Thanks.

Scot Reader
